body_html: Well, what I'm actually asking for is something along the lines of a tf.TextLineReader that supports both streaming / random access. The request came up before e.g. in #2089 . The problem with always closing these feature requests is that people who are looking for easy, new contributions might not see them, although they might be a good first step into the TF code base.
body_text: Well, what I'm actually asking for is something along the lines of a tf.TextLineReader that supports both streaming / random access. The request came up before e.g. in #2089 . body: Well, what I'm actually asking for is something along the lines of a `tf.TextLineReader` that supports both streaming / random access. The request came up before e.g. in #2089 . The problem with always closing these feature requests is that people who are looking for easy, new contributions might not see them, although they might be a good first step into the TF code base.
